_header: Sweet Son rue on me and burst out of Thy bonds
_description: The Lament of the Virgin Mary at the Cross — three monorhyming quatrains in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.First Lines:
Suete sone reu on me & brest out of þi bondisffor nou me
                    þinket þat i se þoru boþen þin
                    hondes…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…þi feet ben nailed to þe tre nou may i no more
                    þriueffor al þis werd with outen þe ne sal me maken
                    bliþe
NLS18721.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XIV Century.

            1952: 82-3.
Luria,  Maxwell Sidney,  and  Richard L. Hoffman, eds.  
             Middle English Lyrics.
         New York: Norton, 1974: 215.

                        ed.  
             Middle English Marian
                    Lyrics.
